title.narrative: IA PG2 Senegal Inclusive Election project

description.narrative: To increase the political participation of women and men with disabilities by promoting representation and active involvement in the local development dynamics and in the elections.

participating-org.narrative: Ireland - Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade
Ministry of Health and Social Welfare - Senegal
National Federation of Disabled People (FESAPH) - Senegal
